items.todoItem: Know that God wants us to discern the signs of the times.
Know that even today many people do not know who Jesus really is.
Know that God gives revelation to men.
Savour the things of God and not those of men.
Deny yourself and take up your cross and follow Jesus.
Know that whoever gives up their life for Jesus will find everalsting life.
Know that when Jesus comes again He will reward every man according to his works.
